name: strava_scrape_segment
description: Scrape a Strava segment. Returns name, distance, elevation, leaderboard entries.

steps.code: const name = document.querySelector('h1, [class*="SegmentName"]')?.textContent?.trim()||''; const stats = {}; document.querySelectorAll('[class*="Stat"], .stat-row, .segment-stats span').forEach(el => { const text = el.textContent.trim(); if(text.length<60) { const parts = text.split(':').map(s=>s.trim()); if(parts.length===2) stats[parts[0].toLowerCase()]=parts[1]; } }); const lb = Array.from(document.querySelectorAll('table tbody tr, [class*="leaderboard"] li')).slice(0,20).map((row,i) => { const cells = Array.from(row.querySelectorAll('td')).map(c=>c.textContent.trim()); const link = row.querySelector('a'); return { rank: i+1, athlete: link?link.textContent.trim():'', data: cells.slice(0,5) }; }); return { segment_id: '{{segment_id}}', name, stats, leaderboard: lb, url: window.location.href }
steps.name: page_data
steps.label: Extract data
